To get the answer from the file, you need to look at the first table where the columns are "primeKey", "gender", "age", "name", "height", "weight", "color". Find the row where the primeKey is "c". The height for this record is in the "height" column of the same row. In this case, the height of record with primeKey "c" is 217.
